title: Boundary-Crossing Mediation Strategy Training for Hybrid Learning Design

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding basic instructional design concepts, no experience in hybrid learning environments
context.additional_context: Social sector job competency design enhancement program for working professionals.

learning_goals: Participants understand hybrid learning design principles connecting diverse learning contexts at a level applicable with over 80% proficiency
Participants independently develop three or more school-to-work integrated learning scenarios in a VR simulation environment.
Participants implement project deliverables based on design principles with 90% completion according to peer evaluation criteria.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
